pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Corruption and Betrayal $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(2)Wit$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Accursed figurines can only be obtained through an act of cold-blooded murder. Villagers will drop them when killed by a players hand.

pages.title: Accursed Figurine
pages.text: $(o)A twisted symbol of malice. It's eyes pleadingly ask why? Why?$()
